description: Creates an override for a rotation in an on-call schedule.

parameters.name: RotationId
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rotation to create an override for.

parameters.name: NewContactIds
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the contacts to replace those in the current on-call rotation with. If you want to include any current team members in the override shift, you must include their ARNs in the new contact ID list. (string) ---

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The date and time when the override goes into effect.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The date and time when the override ends.

nested_items.name: RotationOverrideId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the created rotation override.
